term_id.description: Term ID, if known.  If given a term id, that vocabulary term is directly returned.

query_string.description: Search string to find in the vocabulary list

type.description: Type of the vocabulary to search, ex: subject, function, occupation, geo_place, ...

entity_type.description: Entity type ID to filter vocabulary, if known

results.description: Array of SNAC Term Objects matching the requested query string

term.description: SNAC Term Object of the requested term, if term_id was searched

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Direct Term Read
examples.description: When requesting to find only one term by id, this call returns that exact term, if it exists.

examples.title: Search for Term
examples.description: Being provided with a query string, the search method returns a list of matching results.

read_vocabulary.title: Read Vocabulary Term
read_vocabulary.description: Read a particular controlled vocabulary term.

term_id.description: Term ID, if known.  If given a term id, that vocabulary term is directly returned.

type.description: Type of the vocabulary to search. Currently only uses if geoPlace.

term.description: SNAC Term Object of the requested term

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Read Vocabulary Term
examples.description: When requesting to find only one term by id, this call returns that exact term, if it exists.

examples.title: Read Geo Vocabulary Term
examples.description: If type is set to geoPlace, this will read geographic terms.

reconcile.title: Reconcile Against SNAC
reconcile.description: Reconcile a given constellation against all constellations in SNAC, returning the top results.

constellation.description: Constellation object filled with as much information as known about the identity.

reconciliation.description: A list of reconciliation objects, including strength of the match, the Constellation matched, and a vector of individual scores that comprise the match strength.

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

user_information.title: Get User Information
user_information.description: Returns the information for the given user, including information for Constellations locked to the user.

user.description: Full user object with name, affiliation Constellation, role and privilege list

groups.description: List of Group objects to which the user belongs

messages.description: Unread messages sent to this user

editing.description: Simplified objects of {id, version, nameEntry} of the Constellations this user has checked out

editing_lock.description: Simplified objects of {id, version, nameEntry} of the Constellations this user is currently editing (locked)

review.description: Simplified objects of {id, version, nameEntry} of the Constellations sent for review to any reviewer

review_lock.description: Simplified objects of {id, version, nameEntry} of the Constellations sent for review (locked) to this user

recent.description: Simplified objects of {id, version, nameEntry} of the Constellations recently published by this user

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

insert_constellation.title: Insert New Constellation
insert_constellation.description: Insert a new Constellation into SNAC. The Constellation must have the operation flags set to "insert".

constellation.description: Full Constellation object
Full Constellation object with current id and version numbers

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Insert a simple Constellation
examples.description: Inserting a Constellation with only one nameEntry

update_constellation.title: Update Constellation
update_constellation.description: Updates SNAC's copy of the given Constellation with this one.  Any components with operation flags set to "update" will be overwritten with the new version.

constellation.description: Full Constellation object, with current ids and versions (the result of calling edit)
Full Constellation object with current id and version numbers

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Update a simple Constellation
examples.description: Update a Constellation with only one nameEntry

publish_constellation.title: Publish Constellation
publish_constellation.description: Publishes the given Constellation in SNAC.  This does not make any updates to the Constellation data in SNAC.

constellation.description: Full Constellation object, with current ids and versions (the result of calling edit)
Full Constellation object with current id and version numbers

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Publish a Constellation
examples.description: When publishing, only the bare Constellation object is required to perform the publish.

unlock_constellation.title: Unlock Constellation
unlock_constellation.description: Drops the lock on the given Constellation from "currently editing" down to simply locked to the user.

constellation.description: Constellation object with current ID and Version number
Unlocked Constellation object with current id and version numbers

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Unlock a Constellation
examples.description: When unlocking, only the bare Constellation object is required to perform the unlock.

review_constellation.title: Send Constellation for Review
review_constellation.description: Sends the given Constellation in SNAC for review.  This does not make any updates to the Constellation data in SNAC.  If a reviewer is specified, this query will put the Constellation in that user's review queue.  If no reviewer is specified, the Constellation will go for general review.

reviewer.description: User object of the intended reviewer

constellation.description: Constellation object with at least current ID and Version
Full Constellation object with current id and version numbers

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Sending for Review
examples.description: When sending for review, only the bare Constellation object is required to perform the request.

query.message: Please look over my name headings and biogHist entry

delete_constellation.title: Delete Constellation
delete_constellation.description: Deletes the given Constellation from SNAC.  This does not make any updates to the Constellation data in SNAC before deleting.

constellation.description: Constellation object to delete with at least current ID and Version
Full Constellation object deleted

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Delete a Constellation
examples.description: When deleting, only the bare Constellation object is required to perform the request.

reassign_constellation.title: Reassign Constellation to Another User
reassign_constellation.description: Reassigns the given Constellation to a different user, i.e. changes which user to which the Constellation is locked.  This does not make any updates to the Constellation data in SNAC.

constellation.description: Constellation object to assign, with at least current ID and Version

to_user.description: User object for the user to whom the Constellation should be assigned

constellation.description: Full Constellation object with current id and version numbers

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Reassign Constellation
examples.description: When reassigning a Constellation, only the bare Constellation object is required to perform the request.

recently_published.title: List Recently Published
recently_published.description: Returns a list of the most recently published Constellations in SNAC.

constellation.description: Simplified Constellation objects {id, ark, nameEntry} of the recently published Constellations

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

random_constellations.title: List Random Constellations
random_constellations.description: Returns a random subset of the Constellations in SNAC.

constellation.description: Simplified Constellation objects {id, ark, nameEntry} of random Constellations

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the query succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

list_constellations.title: List Constellations
list_constellations.description: Returns a list of Constellations based on the query parameters.

constellation_history.title: Get Constellation History
constellation_history.description: Returns the edit history of the given Constellation.

constellation.description: Full current Constellation Object

history.description: List of history objects, in reverse order, describing what has happened to the Constellation through the current version.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

data.maintenanceAgency: SNAC: Social Networks and Archival Context Project

download_constellation.title: Download Constellation
download_constellation.description: Returns the full Constellation in the requested format. To perform a direct download, without JSON wrapping, submit a request to the webUI interface, http://snaccooperative.org/download/{constellationid}?type={type} or http://snaccooperative.org/download?arkid={ark}&type={type}.

constellationid.description: Constellation ID for Constellation to read

version.description: Version of the Constellation to read

type.description: What type of file to return: constellation_json or eac_cpf.

arkid.description: ARK ID for Constellation to read, of the form 'http://n2t.net/ark:/99166/xxxxxxxx'

file.description: File information object, including mime-type, filename, and base64-encoded content of the file.

constellation_list_maybesame.title: List Maybe-Same Constellations
constellation_list_maybesame.description: Returns a list of Constellations denoted as maybe-same-as the given Constellation.  If the user object is given, it will contain mergeable flags to denote if the user has permission to merge any of the Constellations.

mergeable.description: Boolean value denoting whether the Constellations can be merged by this user

constellation.description: Summary Constellation Object of the requested Constellation

maybe_same.description: Array of objects, each containing a "mergeable" flag and a Constellation Object of the Constellation asserted to be the maybe the same.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

constellation_add_maybesame.title: Add Maybe-Same Constellation Assertions
constellation_add_maybesame.description: Makes a maybe-same assertion between the constellations specified.

assertion.description: User's assertion statement about the similarity of these Constellations

constellationids.description: 2 or more Constellation IDs to assert as maybe_same

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the merge succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

query.assertion: These three all have the same name and come from the same holding institution

constellation_diff.title: Compute Constellation Diff
constellation_diff.description: Computes the difference between the two given Constellations.  Returns Constellation objects containing: only those items in the first, only those items in the second, and components shared.

constellationid1.description: Constellation ID for one Constellation to compare

version1.description: Constellation Version to compare.  If not set, it will compare the published version.

constellationid2.description: Constellation ID for the other Constellation to compare

version2.description: Constellation Version to compare.  If not set, it will compare the published version.

constellation1.description: Constellation object containing only data distinct to the first Constellation

constellation2.description: Constellation object containing only data distinct to the second Constellation

intersection.description: Constellation object containing only data shared by both Constellations

mergeable.description: Boolean value denoting whether these two Constellations can be merged by this user

constellation_diff_merge.title: Compute Constellation Diff and Set Merge
constellation_diff_merge.description: Computes the difference between the two given Constellations.  Checks out the two Constellations in editing for the given user to allow a merge.  Returns Constellation objects containing: only those items in the first, only those items in the second, and components shared.

constellationid1.description: Constellation ID for one Constellation to compare

constellationid2.description: Constellation ID for the other Constellation to compare

constellation1.description: Constellation object containing only data distinct to the first Constellation

constellation2.description: Constellation object containing only data distinct to the second Constellation

intersection.description: Constellation object containing only data shared by both Constellations

mergeable.description: Boolean value denoting whether these two Constellations can be merged by this user

examples.title: Successful Mergeable Diff
examples.description: If the given user has permission to check both Constellations out for editing, then the system will automatically check them out to the user, produce the diff, and denote to the user in the mergeable flag that the user may merge these constellations.

constellation_merge.title: Merge Constellations
constellation_merge.description: Given Constellation IDs and a full, merged, Constellation, creates a new Constellation in SNAC from the given Constellation and sets all Constellations given by the IDs to be "tombstoned" and redirected to the new, merged, Constellation.

constellationids.description: 2 or more Constellation IDs to merge together.  Each Constellation will be "tombstoned" and point to a new Constellation that matches the one provided by the user in the Constellation parameter.

constellation.description: Full merged Constellation object.  The version of the Constellation here will be considered by SNAC as the merged version; it will be written as a new Constellation.
Full Constellation object with current id and version numbers

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the merge succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Merge three Constellations
examples.description: If we want to merge three Constellations into one, which only has a name entry, we would provide all IDs and the appropriate merged version.

constellation_auto_merge.title: Automatically Merge Constellations
constellation_auto_merge.description: Given Constellation IDs, creates a new Constellation in SNAC from the combined data from all Constellations, "tombstones" the originals, and redirects thier IDs to the new, merged, Constellation.

constellationids.description: 2 or more Constellation IDs to merge together.  Each Constellation will be "tombstoned" and point to a new Constellation that matches the one provided by the user in the Constellation parameter.

constellation.description: Full Constellation object with current id and version numbers

result.description: "success" or "failure" depending on whether the merge succeeded.

timing.description: Number of milliseconds spent to produce the result

examples.title: Auto-merge three Constellations
examples.description: If we want to merge three Constellations into one, which only has a name entry, we would provide all IDs and the system automatically creates a merged version.

read.title: Read Constellation
read.description: Returns the full Constellation for viewing.  Either a constellationid or arkid are required.  If a constellationid and version are both supplied, this will read that version of the constellation, if it exists.

constellationid.description: Constellation ID for Constellation to read

version.description: Version of the Constellation to read

type.description: How much of the Constellation to return.  Without this parameter, the entire Constellation is returned.  If set to "summary", a summary is returned without relationships.

arkid.description: ARK ID for Constellation to read, of the form 'http://n2t.net/ark:/99166/xxxxxxxx'

result.description: "success" if one Constellation is returned, "success-notice" if there is a special return.

message.description: Message relating to the "success-notice" result.  Contains a "text" string including a human-readable note and an "info" object of additional information about the Constellation.

constellation.description: Full Constellation object with current id and version numbers.  If the ID/Ark given point to a Constellation that has been split, multiple Constellation objects will be returned instead.

maybesame_count.description: Number of other Constellations in SNAC listed as maybe-the-same as this one.

examples.title: Read a Constellation
examples.description: By requesting simply a constellationid, we get the current published version of the Constellation.

edit.title: Edit Constellation
edit.description: Check out the Constellation for editing.

parameters.constellation: Constellation object with ID and version to edit

constellationid.description: Constellation ID for Constellation to edit

review_note.description: Reviewer's note, if set by another user.

constellation.description: Full Constellation object with current id and version numbers, ready for editing.  Those id/version values must be present with future update queries.

search.title: Search Constellations
search.description: Search for a Constellation, returning a list of possible matches.

browse.title: Browse Constellations
browse.description: Given a query name heading, returns the surrounding matching Constellations (in alphabetical order).

insert_resource.title: Insert Resource
insert_resource.description: Given a Resource, inserts it into SNAC's resource cache.

update_resource.title: Update Resource
update_resource.description: Given a Resource, update the resource cache in SNAC by overwriting it with the given one.

read_resource.title: Read Resource
read_resource.description: Read the entire Resource from SNAC's resource cache.

resource_search.title: Search Resources
resource_search.description: Searches the resource cache in SNAC.  Returns the top matches.
